ConfigurationGroup.title: FEDEX
ConfigurationGroup.description: Configuration Settings For The FEDEX Extension

EXTENSION_FED_EX_ENABLED.title: Enable FEDEX
EXTENSION_FED_EX_ENABLED.description: Enable Or Disable The FEDEX Extension

EXTENSION_FED_EX_METER.title: FEDEX METER NUMBER
EXTENSION_FED_EX_METER.description: Enter the Fedex MeterID assigned to you, set to NONE to obtain a new meter number

EXTENSION_FED_EX_ACCOUNT.title: FEDEX ACCOUNT
EXTENSION_FED_EX_ACCOUNT.description: Enter the fedex Account Number assigned to you

EXTENSION_FED_EX_ADDRESS1.title: FEDEX address1
EXTENSION_FED_EX_ADDRESS1.description: Enter the first line of your ship from street address

EXTENSION_FED_EX_ADDRESS2.title: FEDEX address2
EXTENSION_FED_EX_ADDRESS2.description: Enter the second line of your ship from street address, leave set to NONE if you do not need to specify a second line

EXTENSION_FED_EX_CITY.title: FEDEX CITY
EXTENSION_FED_EX_CITY.description: Enter the city name for the ship from street address

EXTENSION_FED_EX_STATE.title: FEDEX STATE
EXTENSION_FED_EX_STATE.description: Enter the 2 letter state or province name for the ship from street address, required for Canada and US

EXTENSION_FED_EX_POSTAL.title: FEDEX POSTAL CODE
EXTENSION_FED_EX_POSTAL.description: Enter the postal code for the ship from street address

EXTENSION_FED_EX_PHONE.title: FEDEX PHONE
EXTENSION_FED_EX_PHONE.description: Enter a contact phone number for your company

EXTENSION_FED_EX_LASTSHIPMENT.title: FEDEX Last shipment
EXTENSION_FED_EX_LASTSHIPMENT.description: Define last shipment time (ex: 17 would be 5pm on your server)
